parameter.name: targetObject
parameter.shortdesc: The document the process should inspect.

parameter.name: appliedProfile
parameter.shortdesc: The preflight profile that should be used.

parameter.name: preflightOptions
parameter.shortdesc: The preflight options that should be used. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new PreflightProcess &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the PreflightProcess.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProcess with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProcesses within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The PreflightProcess, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PreflightProcess, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The PreflightProcess, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PreflightProcess, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first PreflightProcess in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last PreflightProcess in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle PreflightProcess in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProcess with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the PreflightProcess that follows the desired PreflightProcess.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the PreflightProcess whose index follows the specified PreflightProcess in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The PreflightProcess whose index comes before the desired PreflightProcess.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any PreflightProcess in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every PreflightProcess in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PreflightProcess.
Returns the PreflightProcess with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
